briefTitle: Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study of AbobotulinumtoxinA (Dysport®) for the Treatment of Cervical Dystonia
officialTitle: A Phase III Multicentre, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Dysport® for the Treatment of Cervical Dystonia
summary: The aim of this study is to demonstrate the effectiveness and safety of 500 units of Dysport manufactured at a new manufacturing facility in Europe.

primaryOutcome.measure: Toronto Western Spasmodic Torticollis Rating Scale (TWSTRS)
